### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 88
- Low Temperature (°F): 68
- Precipitation (in): 0.12
- Wind Speed (mph): 12
- Conditions: Scattered showers

### Field Notes
- Riparian vegetation healthy along corridor
- Benthic macroinvertebrate survey scheduled next week
- Cr at WQ-03: 105 µg/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (105 µg/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 µg/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (65.2 µg/L) approaching MCL threshold

### Events
- Algal bloom index 1.8 at WQ-06, within summer range
- WQ-04 conductivity probe swapped per maintenance schedule
- Boat ramp sediment cleared at WQ-05

### Notes
- Day 23 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 105 µg/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.
